RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 59. Maiden Special Weight Purse 30000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOOD AND STOUT in the second flight early, asked for some turn turn, carved into the leader's advantage entering the stretch, collared that foe under pressure with less than a furlong remaining, drew out steadily late while being kept to task. HYMN FOR CARLOS broke through the gate prior to the start, broke on top despite being a bit rank, quickly clear, maintained a sizable advantage through the turn, had little for the winner when that one came alongside inside the furlong grounds, no match. STRONG DIAMOND outside the winner early, fell back off that one into the turn, no threat through the stretch to trail home.

ENTRY.NAME: Hymn for Carlos
ENTRY.OWNER: Bruno Jr Gerald Deville Carl J and Our Blue Streaks Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke thru prestart, bit rank, quickly clear,long lead, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Good and Stout
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, asked turn, reeled in leader, driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Adcock's Red River Farm, LLC & HumeWornall

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, no threat top two

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 93. Claiming Purse 19500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 15, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since May 15, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $20,00 0, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARLIE G outrun early while saving ground, continued to race toward the inside up the backstretch, asked along and began to advance from between horses midway on the second bend, came four wide for the drive, took over, inside the furlong marker and edged clear. EYE DEE KAY in mid pack while also racing along the inside, bobbled far turn, continued to save ground into the lane, turned in a gutty effort along the rail to garner the place spot. GET THEM JUSTIN forwardly placed while three wide, continued to stalk the middle half in the three path, mildly challenged inside the furlong grounds, outkicked late for the runner up spot. ENTERTAINMENT broke in to tighten up NATE'S ATTACK just after the start, was straightened to clear before a quarter, continued to show the way into and through the second turn, allowed the the runner up the rail as he was being headed by the winner late, caved in to lose a couple of more positions in the waning strides. NATE'S ATTACK squeezed just after the start, fell back to race in mid pack, came four wide for the drive, displayed a mild amount of late interest to improve a bit. STANDING MAN lacked speed, between horses into the far turn, improved a bit in the drive without posing a serious threat. JACI'S ROYALTY remained back in lacking a serious closing response. RIPITTOTHERIGHT pressed the issue up front for six furlongs in the two path, had little left for the stretch drive. COLONIST last away, was never a threat. UNFATHOMED in mid pack outside, was four to five wide turning for home, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Dee Kay
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack inside, bobble far turn, gutty effort inside

ENTRY.NAME: Ripittotheright
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2p, little left late

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie G
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early inside, asked btwn foes 2nd, 4w into lane, took over

ENTRY.NAME: Get Them Justin
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, bid midstretch, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Unfathomed
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, tired 4-5w

ENTRY.NAME: Nate's Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: squeezed start, back and off rail, 4w into rail, mild interest

ENTRY.NAME: Entertainment
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, clear before quarter, pace, caved in late

ENTRY.NAME: Jaci's Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in lacking a serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Colonist
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Standing Man
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, mild improvement, never dangerous

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7F Dirt CR: 44. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BATTLE OF WITS dueled up front outside, continued to alternate through the turn, held a slight advantage past the furlong marker, edging clear late. ZIPPING MOLLY broke on top, dueled up front while along the inside, continued on equal terms into and through upper stretch, failed to match strides with the winner late, clearly second best. ABBY DABBY in the second flight outside, finished up best of the rest in lacking a closing response. MS. PRIESTLY broke out, bumped SHOTGUN ANNIE, settled in the second flight toward the inside, went evenly throughout in also lacking a closing bid. KASENS TRIBE fell back to trail after the start, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. SHOTGUN ANNIE bumped at the break, raced back throughout and failed to menace. LACEY'S STAR off a step slow, moved up a bit early, steadily backed up through the stretch to be well beaten at the end.

ENTRY.NAME: Kasens Tribe
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, passed couple of tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Priestly
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bump, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Lacey's Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, moved up, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Shotgun Annie
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, back, did not menace

ENTRY.NAME: Zipping Molly
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, dueled out of chute inside, long drive, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Abby Dabby
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, best rest

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Wits
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled outside, extended pace battle, proved best, determined

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TSURIS void of early while four wide through the first turn, continued outside, four wide again into the second bend when beginning to advance, outside bid approaching the furlong marker, drew clear late under steady handling. CATINANDSCATIN dueled early along the inside, allowed the other speed to go after a quarter, rebid on the outside of that rival far turn, vied into and through upper stretch between foes, proved no match for the winner late, held sway for the place. SABER STORM in the second flight early, fell back the middle half, four wide into the lane, along for the show late. CHIEF KIMOSABI in the second flight off the inside, advanced and lodged a bid between horses past the furlong marker, failed to sustain that effort to the wire. UNBRIDLED PULPIT went one paced throughout in lacking a closing punch. COTTONCLUB SOLDIER dueled up front early in the two path, clear after a quarter, faltered when headed by the runner up turning for home. WILDCARD GOLD never menaced in remaining back throughout. BARNEY'S PASSION in mid pack early, stopped after a half, distanced after losing contact with the field stretch, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Catinandscatin
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, fell back, rebid, no match late

ENTRY.NAME: Unbridled Pulpit
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced throughout, lacked closing punch

ENTRY.NAME: Saber Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, fell back, four wide into lane, along late show

ENTRY.NAME: Cottonclub Soldier
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, shook clear, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcard Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced in remaining back

ENTRY.NAME: Chief Kimosabi
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group, bid btwn foes 1/8, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Barney's Passion
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, stopped after a half, distanced, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Tsuris
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot 4w, 4w again 2nd turn, outside bid, clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TACTICAL VISION away in good order, allowed to settle off the pace inside, continued to save ground onto the backstretch, tipped out three wide turning for home, challenged in upper straight, kicked well clear the final furlong under firm handling. EASY EDDIE A unhurried early, moved outside, came three wide and behind the winner turning for home, unable to keep up with that one the final furling, still displayed good resolve to be up late for part of the place. BUCK'S GLORY back off the early pace, asked along outside the winner far turn, idled into the lane well out in the course, late push to be up a share of the second spot. UNCLE HUTCH sprinted clear the opening quarter, set the pace inside, briefly responded when challenged when straightened for home, weakened final furlong. BLEEP BLEEP chased the leader for six furlongs, challenged turning for home, vied past the furlong marker between horses, faltered late. ASTROLOGY WONOWON raced within striking distance for five furlongs, came up empty for the drive. ALL TOGETHER broke back and failed to menace. POWER MASTER also a bit slow away, moved up to race in mid pack early and tired. CREOLE REB restless in the gate then was unprepared for the start to spot the field a couple of lengths, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, tipped out 3w, bid, kicked well clear

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Easy Eddie A
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, moved out, came on the outside, up 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Power Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit slow away, moved up to mid pack, tired drive

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Hutch
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear opening quarter, pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Creole Reb
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, unprepared start, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Wonowon
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Buck's Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, belated interest, up part 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Bleep Bleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid between, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: All Together
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, did not menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORGED IN STEEL in the second flight off the inside, moved closer in the three path turning for home, dueled past the furlong marker then kicked clear late. R T'S D'ORO pressed the early leader, engaged that one before a half, dueled then salted that rival away midway on the final turn, responded when the winner came alongside entering the stretch, could not match strides with that one late, clearly second best. C. F. CONGRESS settled off the pace and the inside, proved no match for the top two in the drive, finished up best of the rest. MULETRAIN four wide first turn, mid pack while remaining off the inside, roused three wide and behind the winner turning for home, chased the top pair past the furlong marker, went evenly to the wire to be caught for the show. DARK MATTER lacked early foot, came five wide out of the final turn, improved position a bit while not a serious threat. K V TARGET had nothing for the stretch run. INSPECTOR ED moved up to show the way first turn inside, dueled into the far turn inside the runner up and gave way. SNEAKY ALLIE KAT off slowly, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Inspector Ed
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace, gave way far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sneaky Allie Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: R T's d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, early bid, dueled, 2nd duel stretch, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: K V Target
ENTRY.COMMENT: had nothing for the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Forged in Steel
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, 3w advance, dueled, kicked clear late

ENTRY.NAME: C. F. Congress
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Muletrain
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, roused 3w into lane, evenly late

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Matter
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 5w into lane, improved bit

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 5F Turf CR: 78. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since May 15, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A R ace Since April 15, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY BAYOU with the pace from the start, vied three wide into the turn, into the stretch two path, came in past the gap with less that a furlong remaining to float WHACUDPOSBLYGOWRN inward, came out in the final strides and crossed first in a determined effort. TACTICAL PRIORITY also raced with the pace from the start, vied inside into the turn, dueled into the lane, continued on equal terms with the winner past the furlong marker, floated in a bit into the gap, continued to battle on to the finish, missed. LOVEU AND PROUDOFU contested the early pace between the top two, fell back off that pair late in the turn, moved outside, was coming again late while outside that same two rivals. M AND M'S CUSTOM broke back, lacked speed, dropped to the inside turn, improved position by splitting foes late, not a threat to top three. HALF OURS N STORMY in the second flight off the inside, came in the two path for the drive, lacked a closing punch. COMANCHE WARRIOR in mid pack off the inside, came three wide when roused turning for home, also went one paced late. WIN WON DOBBS off the pace while racing outside, four wide through the turn, went evenly to the wire as well. MAD GOLD lacked a response in the drive. F T W SLAM last away, failed to menace. WHACUDPOSBLYGOWRNG failed to threaten while racing outside. FOLLOWING A STEWARDS' INQUIRY REGARDING THE RUN THROUGH DEEP STRETCH, NO ACTION WAS TAKEN.

ENTRY.NAME: F T W Slam
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, never menaced

ENTRY.NAME: Tactical Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early inside, dueled rail, floated in 1/16, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Half Ours N Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail, lacked closing punch

ENTRY.NAME: Mad Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: had little response for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Loveu and Proudofu
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace btwn, fell back off duel,coming again late outside

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Bayou
ENTRY.COMMENT: with early pace 3w, dueled into lane, came in then out late

ENTRY.NAME: Whacudposblygowrng
ENTRY.COMMENT: not a threat outside

ENTRY.NAME: Comanche Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and three wide, one paced late

ENTRY.NAME: M and M's Custom
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, dropped inside turn, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Win Won Dobbs
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace outside, 4w turn, evenly drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHY BOY broke with the leaders, vied four wide early, between foes into the lane, drove clear nearing midstretch and held a daylight advantage to the wire. OURPERFECTPRINCE behind the pace, off the inside, roused four wide into the stretch, finished willingly to be in time for the place. ASTROLOGYSPROTEGE in the second group out of the gate, moved closer four wide into the turn, chased the winner through upper stretch, had little for that foe the final furlong, caught late for the second spot. RAZZ lacked early foot, moved out widest for the drive, displayed some belated interest to be gaining for the show spot. FLASHY BOY GOES in mid pack while toward the inside, came up empty for the drive. GOLDUSTER in a bit tight at the break, one paced through the stretch in failing to rally. CUSTOM PRAYER flashed some early foot along the inside, faded. COLT'S BRIM remained back, failed to respond. D T'S DREAM fell back to trail after the start and was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early along the inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Colt's Brim
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Ourperfectprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind the pace off rail, roused 4w into lane, willing 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke with leaders, vied 4w early, btwn foes into lane, shook clr

ENTRY.NAME: Razz
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, widest drive, mild,belated interest

ENTRY.NAME: D T's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Golduster
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit tight start, one paced stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Astrologysprotege
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group early, 4w into turn, chased, caught 2nd
